content.rendered:
Naveed has been working as a lecturer in Regent College London from January 2019 to date. He has previously worked in Ford Motor from 1998-2016 as a Financial Controller, managing a budget of USD 440 Million of selling expense for Europe. He also worked as an Internal Auditor and in Marketing & Sales operations. Prior to that he worked in Siemens from 1983 to1993 in Project sales & management.

Naveed is passionate about teaching. Regent College London may not be a Russel group institution but the reading material in his lectures are from HBR, MIT Sloan Review, PWC and McKinsey. By the end of semester, his students start debating and interacting at the same level!!!

Courses taught

BA Hons: Global Marketing, Finance, Economics, and Entrepreneurship, opportunity & innovation
